overview: ‚ÄúHUZZLE‚Äù This film tells the story of an average Nigerian girl who is a graduate, trying to make a living for herself  so as to fend for  her poor mother, having done menial jobs like hawking bananas on the street, carrying sands/ blocks at the site with laborers she decides to search for a white collar job in the nooks and crannies of Lagos and luckily for her she finds one, but she has to go dirty just to secure the job...  Director EmekaShotit Mouto Dgs on this one  üé• Shotitfilmdynasty/ Judith Ojonugwa Sickle Cell Foundation
title: Huzzle
